label: spam
subject: [Mhln] On prosto chital gazetu, obryvajetsja tromb - serze ostanovilos.
body: What I have said concerning the probability of chances can serve to no other purpose, than to assist us in explaining the probability of causes; since it is commonly allowed by philosophers, that what the vulgar call chance is nothing but a secret and concealed cause. That species of probability, therefore, is what we must chiefly examine.
